about_the_game:
Defend the moon from alien invasion as you build the ultimate defense company.


Build your company how you want. Expand your office and hire new employees to research new technologies or save costs. Customize your office and improve your staff moral, maybe even adopt a Cat!


Defend against alien swarms by creating unique weapon combinations and take advantage of alien weaknesses.


Outsource your defense needs with airstrikes, mechs and orbital lasers.


Research new weapons by utilizing your skilled employees.

In the year 2124, humanity is in a golden age of expansion. Corporations build great domed cities on the moon, with all eyes set to see which business will be the first to make it big on Mars. When the humdrum of business as usual is interrupted by strange alien creatures raining down upon the moonscape, the lunar government puts out a call for action, and opens up contracts for corporations to defend the moon!

Arriving from Earth to seek opportunity, you are best placed to be the ultimate company CEO and military strategist. Create, customize and run your own company of employees, research weapon technology and business upgrades. Accept contracts and join the action by taking control of your units on the battlefield to defend the moon against an alien invasion. Aliens down, profits up!
